content.raw:
I will look at this in the lab today, but it looks like there is a small bug:

```
+            # bit depth, number of patterns, invert patterns?, trigger type, trigger delay (4 bytes), trigger period (4 bytes), exposure time (4 bytes), led select
+            self.send(self.send_packet_type['write'], self.command['sequence_setting'],  struct.pack('<BBBBiiiB',1,num_of_patterns,0,2,0,0,250,0))
```

  
Notice that exposure time is set to 250 us.  According to the documentation this has the property “Exposure time: number of microseconds the pattern is displayed. Input 0 to display the pattern through the whole trigger period.” From page 36 of dlpu006e.pdf.  It would seem that this should be 0 rather than 250 us.
